dateFormat

public static final java.lang.String dateFormat(java.util.Date date)
Convert a Date to an ISO-standard format. This is thread safe, even though the underlying DateFormat.format() method is not thread safe.

Parameters:
date - The Date to convert
Returns:
string in the format yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss
See Also:
factoryDateFormat()

dateFormatMicrosec

public static final java.lang.String dateFormatMicrosec(long micros)
Convert a value in microseconds to an ISO-standard format. This is thread safe, even though the underlying DateFormat.format() method is not thread safe.

Returns:
string in the format yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.xxxxxx
See Also:
factoryDateFormat()

dateFormatMillisec

public static final java.lang.String dateFormatMillisec(long millis)
Convert a value in milliseconds to an ISO-standard format. This is thread safe, even though the underlying DateFormat.format() method is not thread safe.

Returns:
string in the format yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.xxx
See Also:
factoryDateFormat()

dateFormatSeconds

public static final java.lang.String dateFormatSeconds(long seconds)
Convert a value in seconds to an ISO-standard format. This is thread safe, even though the underlying DateFormat.format() method is not thread safe.

Parameters:
seconds - The number of seconds since 00:00:00 1 Jan 1970
Returns:
string in the format yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss
See Also:

factoryDateFormat

public static final java.text.DateFormat factoryDateFormat()
Create a data format for ISO dates. This might be needed if there is deadlock with the dateFormat method.

Returns:
a data format which will format a date into ISO format
See Also:
dateFormat(java.util.Date)

nonNull

public static final java.util.ArrayList nonNull(java.util.ArrayList list)
Get an ArrayList, converting null to a zero-length array.

Parameters:
list - The base list, may be null.
Returns:
The base list if it's non-null; otherwise a zero-length array.

nonNull

public static final java.lang.String nonNull(java.lang.String str)
Get a String, converting null to a zero-length string. Also intern's the string for faster comparisons later.

Parameters:
str - The base string, may be null.
Returns:
The base list if it's non-null; otherwise a zero-length string.

From a list of objects, produce a string with all their elements. Space is used as the separator

list - The list of objects.

toString

public static final java.lang.String toString(java.util.AbstractCollection list,
                                              java.lang.String sep)
From a list of objects, produce a string with all their elements.

Parameters:
list - The list of objects.
sep - The separator between individual objects on output.
Returns:
list[0].toString() + sep + list[1].toString() + sep + ... + list[list.length].toString()

toString

public static final java.lang.String toString(java.util.ArrayList list)
From a list of objects, produce a string with all their elements. Space is used as the separator

Parameters:
list - The list of objects.
Returns:
list[0].toString() + " " + list[1].toString() + " " + ... + list[list.length].toString()
